Template & Studio


Studio Settings
Product Specific

1 min
this button allows the admin to view and manage the studio settings depending on the specific products with this selection, the studio settings will load product wise here, you will have option to filter the settings based on the product wise edit the settings using the pencil like icon to copy the same setting to another product, click on the copy to another
